title: Apply custom background image and improve text visibility

requirements.text: Use the uploaded image IMG_20260219_080023.png.jpg as the application background across all pages

quotes: Use this file as app background

acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded image is displayed as a fixed background across all application pages
Background image maintains proper aspect ratio and covers the entire viewport
Background image does not interfere with content readability

requirements.text: Ensure dark theme is maintained throughout the application with the new background
acceptanceCriteria: All UI components maintain dark theme styling
Cards, panels, and overlays have dark backgrounds that contrast with the background image
Navigation elements preserve dark theme appearance

requirements.text: Update font colors to white or near-white tones to ensure visibility against the dark background image

quotes: make the font colour like a bit white make it visible in a black background

acceptanceCriteria: Primary text uses white or near-white colors (e.g., rgb(255, 255, 255) or rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9))
All text elements are clearly readable against the background image
Text contrast meets accessibility standards for dark backgrounds
Secondary text uses lighter shades (e.g., rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7)) while maintaining readability

constraints: Do not modify backend logic or data structures
Preserve existing sci-fi theme aesthetic while integrating the new background
Maintain all existing functionality and navigation
nonGoals: Changing the color scheme beyond text visibility improvements
Altering the layout structure or component hierarchy
